snippet: The National Democratic Institute and the International Republican Institute accused Egypt’s military-led government of a campaign of false statements about their history.
abstract: American democracy-building organizations the National Democratic Institute and the International Republican Institute accuse Egypt’s military-led government of a campaign of false statements about their history; accusation ratchets up confrontation between Washington and Cairo over police raids that shut down groups' offices.
lead_paragraph: The National Democratic Institute and the International Republican Institute accused Egypt’s military-led government of a campaign of false statements about their history.

headline.seo: Raided American Groups Rebut Egyptian Accusations
headline.print_headline: Raided American Groups Say They Tried to Follow Egypt’s Rules

keywords.value: National Democratic Institute for International Affairs
keywords.name: organizations
